Title: Lunar (ElberethZone)
Description:
This is a very old map I made when Duke Nukem 3D was first released. 

Moon base with 2 buildings, startrek door, etc... 
Made for deathmatch, no monsters in SP (but you can use SP mode to check the level). 

Original version of the user map can be found on: 
http://www.elberethzone.net 
(In Programs > Archived programs section) 

Music by: 
Gotham (DETHTOLL.MOD) 
by Lee Jackson
